description.part1: Мы стремимся обеспечить быструю и надежную доставку для всех наших клиентов.
description.part2: Наши услуги охватывают как внутренние, так и международные заказы.

generalInfo.title: Общая информация
generalInfo.description: Мы сотрудничаем с ведущими логистическими компаниями для своевременной доставки.

standard.title: Стандартная доставка
standard.description: Обычная доставка, подходящая для большинства заказов.

domestic.title: Внутренние заказы
domestic.description: Мы доставляем заказы по всей стране через надежных партнеров.

international.title: Международные заказы
international.description: Международная доставка доступна в большинство стран мира.

card.title: Оплата картой
card.description: Мы принимаем все основные кредитные и дебетовые карты.

cash.title: Оплата наличными
cash.description: Вы можете оплатить заказ наличными при получении.

online.title: Онлайн-платежи
online.description: Поддерживаются PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay и другие методы.

times.title: Время доставки
times.description: Время доставки зависит от вашего региона и метода доставки.
times.workdays: Доставка в рабочие дни: с 9:00 до 18:00
times.weekend: Доставка в выходные дни: с 10:00 до 16:00
times.holidays: Доставка в праздничные дни может быть ограничена

notes.title: Важные замечания
notes.tracking: Все заказы отслеживаются, и номер отслеживания отправляется по электронной почте.
notes.insurance: Мы рекомендуем застраховать заказы с высокой стоимостью.
notes.signature: Для получения заказа может потребоваться подпись.
notes.reschedule: Вы можете изменить дату и время доставки, связавшись с нашей поддержкой.

measures.compliance: Compliance with GDPR and other standards

repair.intro: Jewelry is created to last for centuries, but even the most durable items can lose their perfect appearance. Over time, scratches appear, chain links weaken, locks fail, and precious stones need renewed setting. Instead of putting your favorite jewelry in a drawer, entrust its restoration to professionals.
repair.description: At Queen Diamond workshop, we carefully and thoroughly restore jewelry, regardless of the complexity of the repair. Our craftsmen can:

services.locks: Repair and replace clasps, links, and locks
services.polish: Polish the surface, removing scratches and scuffs
services.chains: Restore the integrity of chains, bracelets, and earrings
services.rhodium: Refresh rhodium plating, restore shine to gold and silver

repair.value: We understand that each piece of jewelry has its own value, whether it is a gift, a family heirloom, or a symbol of important events. Therefore, at Queen Diamond, we approach each item with special care, guaranteeing the quality of work and the safety of your jewelry treasure.
repair.conclusion: Don't postpone jewelry repair – entrust its restoration to Queen Diamond professionals, and it will become perfect again!

create.intro: Bring your ideal jewelry to life with Queen Diamond. You can not only choose materials, but also participate in the creation process: from idea to finished product. We will select the shape and size of the stones, the shade of the metal and design details, taking into account all your wishes.
create.description: Production takes up to 14 days and includes several stages:
create.productionTime: Production takes up to 14 days and includes several stages:

idea.title: Idea and design
idea.description: Each piece of jewelry begins with a concept. You can offer your own sketch, choose an inspiring example, or develop a design together with our specialist. We will estimate the cost and timing of the work or adjust the project to your budget.

model.title: Creating a 3D model
model.description: At this stage, a computer model is created that can be refined. Shape, size, color accents - all this is easy to change. If you want to add stones or complex elements, the cost will be recalculated taking into account the new details.

visualization.title: Final visualization
visualization.description: After approving the design, we will create a realistic render of the future jewelry. You will be able to examine the product in detail from all angles and make final adjustments if necessary.

replica.title: Wax replica
replica.description: Before proceeding with manufacturing, an accurate wax copy is created. This allows you to make sure that all elements look as intended. Upon request, we will provide a photo or video of the model.

production.title: Jewelry production
production.description: At the final stage, the product is cast, ground, polished and stones are fixed. As a result, you get not just a piece of jewelry, but an exclusive work created specifically for you.

create.conclusion: Creating jewelry to your order is an art that requires time and skill. You pay not only for materials, but also for exclusivity, the value of which increases many times, making it not just expensive, but a unique heritage.

guarantee.intro: We are confident in the quality of our jewelry, which is why we provide a 3-year warranty for manufacturing defects and hidden defects.

covered.title: What's Covered?
covered.description: The warranty covers defects that could not be detected upon receipt of the item but appeared during wear and affected its quality.

items.mechanical: Mechanical damage (impacts, chips, scratches, deformation, ring breakage, loosening of stone settings)
items.repair: Repairs or size modifications at third-party workshops
items.misuse: Improper use and care leading to damage
items.chemical: Exposure to chemicals (household chemicals, cosmetics, mercury, high temperature)

important.title: Important Note
important.description: Some metals in the alloy (nickel, copper, zinc, silver) may cause allergic reactions or skin darkening. This is an individual body characteristic and is not covered by the warranty.

care.title: How to Maintain Perfect Jewelry Appearance
care.description: Precious metals and stones require careful handling as they are susceptible to mechanical damage and environmental influences. To keep your jewelry in perfect condition, follow these simple care rules:

rules.fit: Ensure comfortable ring fit. If jewelry fits too tightly against the skin, bacteria can accumulate underneath, causing irritation.
rules.activity: Remove rings before physical activity. Metal can get scratched, and stones can crack from impact.
rules.beach: Don't wear jewelry at the beach. Sand scratches metal, and cold water can cause rings to slip off fingers.
rules.chemicals: Avoid contact with chemicals and cosmetics. Cleaning products and skincare items can leave stains or weaken metal.
rules.rhodium: Rhodium plating needs renewal. Over time, white gold may acquire a yellowish tint. To restore its shine, periodically have professional rhodium plating done at a workshop.

guarantee.conclusion: Regular care and timely maintenance will help preserve your jewelry in perfect condition for many years to come.

gia.intro: When you choose Queen Diamond jewelry, you invest in time-tested quality. All our diamonds come exclusively from verified suppliers — the best diamond exchanges in Belgium and Israel. Each stone comes with a certificate confirming its authenticity and high quality. We are confident in our materials and guarantee that every diamond we offer meets strict international standards.

certificate.value: The certificate not only confirms the origin of the stone but also affects the price of the jewelry. See for yourself: simply scan the QR code on the certificate and visit the official GIA website, where you'll find all the information about your diamond.

what.title: What is a GIA Certificate and Why is it Important?
what.description: GIA (Gemological Institute of America) is one of the most authoritative independent laboratories evaluating precious stones. It developed the international 4C system by which each diamond is evaluated.
what.system: This system allows for precise determination of the carat weight, color, clarity, and cut of the stone, which is crucial for its value and long-term worth.

laser.title: Unique Laser Marking
laser.description: GIA has also implemented unique laser marking that cannot be counterfeited. This micro-number, visible only under magnification, confirms that your diamond is genuine and belongs only to you. It is recorded in the GIA database, allowing the stone's history to be tracked.

conclusion.title: Your Investment in Quality
conclusion.description: With a GIA certificate and laser marking, you can be confident that your diamond is not just a precious gem, but an asset that will maintain its value and beauty for many years. With Queen Diamond jewelry, you get not only a stylish accessory but also a valuable investment that will bring you joy and become part of your family history.

publicOffer.intro: This agreement governs the terms of purchase of goods remotely from Queen Diamond.

subject.title: Subject of the Agreement
subject.text: The Seller commits to transfer the goods to the Buyer, and the Buyer commits to accept and pay for them under the terms outlined herein.

payment.title: Payment Conditions
payment.text: Payment is accepted via cash, credit card, or online payment services as indicated on our website.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.text: We arrange secure and insured delivery worldwide. Details and options are available on our Delivery page.

warranty.title: Warranty and Returns
warranty.text: All jewelry is provided with a warranty in accordance with consumer protection laws. Please see our Warranty Policy for details.

final.title: Final Provisions
final.text: This agreement is effective from the moment the order is placed and remains in effect until all obligations are fulfilled.

details.legalCompliance: Queen Diamond operates in full compliance with the laws of Ukraine.

description.intro: When choosing a ring, it's important to consider not only standard sizes but also fitting characteristics. To determine the size, try on a similar piece of jewelry in a jewelry store. It's advisable to test several options, as measurement systems may slightly differ.

generalInfo.title: Before Measuring
generalInfo.description: Proper size selection is key to comfortable jewelry wear. A professional consultant in our salon will help you determine the exact size.

width.title: The width of the model also matters

narrow.title: Narrow rings (up to 5 mm)
narrow.description: Fit better in a slightly smaller size

wide.title: Wide models (from 5 mm)
wide.description: Require a slightly larger size to avoid finger compression

timing.title: Best time to measure finger size
timing.description: The optimal time to measure your finger is between 12:00 and 14:00, when its size is most stable.

avoid.morning: Not in the morning or hot weather when fingers might be swollen
avoid.cold: Not immediately after coming in from the cold — let your hands warm up

timing.best: The optimal time for accurate measurements is during the day at a comfortable temperature

surprise.title: How to find out ring size discreetly
surprise.tip1: Find a ring she wears on the intended finger and take it to a jewelry store for measurement
surprise.tip2: Try on her jewelry on your finger and note the level to which it slides on freely

notes.title: Important Note
notes.resizing: If the ring doesn't fit perfectly, don't worry — we'll adjust the size free of charge to ensure the jewelry fits perfectly on your hand
